item.title: Manny Pacquiao vs. Mario Barrios Livestream: How to Watch the Premier Boxing Champions Live Online
item.description: Vegas, baby! Premier Boxing Champions goes to “The Gambling Capital of the World” tonight, where boxing icon Manny Pacquiao (62-8-2) takes on WBC Welterweight World Champion Mario Barrios
